name: Plunder Pirates
summary:
Ahoy, matey! Take to the high seas as a cut-throat buccaneer and become the most notorious Pirate Captain to ever sail the seven seas! Washed ashore with nothing but your cunning, do you have what it takes to become the most formidable pirate in the world?

Build your island, recruit a crew, explore uncharted waters and join your friends in a Guild! It’s FREE to play – so get ready to build, battle and PLUNDER!
info:
• 中文名: 海盗掠夺
  • 发行: Rovio Entertainment Ltd
  • 别名: Pirates!
  • 游戏类型: 策略类
  • 售价: Free
  • 官方网站: http://www.plunderpirates.com/
